name: sshwifty
tagline: A browser based SSH and Telnet client
description: Sshwifty is a self-hosted SSH and Telnet client running in the browser, allowing secure terminal sessions through a web interface without a traditional client installed.

features.title: Browser Ssh
features.description: Connects to SSH servers directly from web browser

features.title: Telnet Support
features.description: Accesses Telnet servers alongside SSH connections

features.title: Multiple Sessions
features.description: Opens multiple SSH connections in tabs simultaneously

features.title: Terminal Emulation
features.description: Provides full terminal emulation with color and formatting support

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Uploads and downloads files via SFTP in browser

features.title: Authentication
features.description: Supports password, public key, and keyboard-interactive auth

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Works on desktop and mobile browsers
